treatments_requested.name: Oxycodone-Acetaminophen
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: To be taken once every six hours as needed for pain

treatments_not_tried.name: Non-opioid Treatments
treatments_not_tried.other_or_notes: Behavior therapy and other non-opioid medications

guidelines_details: The WHO ladder for pain relief suggests non-opioid treatments should be tried first. Not all non-opioid options have been utilized.
soc_details: Opioids should be returned to preoperative status within weeks, and not all non-opioid medication classes have been optimized or tried.
rationale: The requested medication is not medically necessary as not all non-opioid treatment options have been utilized, and there are issues with opioid prescribing without documented treatment goals.
reviewer_credentials: Board certified in anesthesiology with sub-specialty certification in pain medicine, actively practicing, and experienced in treating similar conditions.
